ComicInfo.Summary:
The gang is transported back into the 60's, and Angel takes more than a little liking to the "free spirit" nature of the times. However, the Blood Diamond ups the ante on the group, as it literally starts a war in Vietnam in order to stop the threat of the Zombie Tramp before it even begins!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Marco Maccagni | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Marco Maccagni | 2 | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 3 | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Winston Young | 4 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Michael McComb | 5 | F | Risqué Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Michael McComb | 6 |
